weaknesses: Resume focuses heavily on AI/ML skills, not relevant to the target job.
Lack of demonstrable experience with required technologies.
Achievements are not quantified or impactful enough.

achievements_to_add_modify.original: Développement d’une solution de classification 3D (97% de précision)
achievements_to_add_modify.suggestion: Quantify impact and add context.  E.g., 'Developed a 3D classification solution resulting in a 97% accuracy improvement, leading to X% reduction in processing time.'
Specify technologies used and quantify impact.  E.g., 'Developed a 360° visualization system using [technologies], resulting in improved user engagement and X% reduction in data visualization time.'

issues: Resume may not be ATS-friendly due to formatting and special characters.
recommendations: Convert to a plain text format before submitting to ATS.

structure_review.section_organization: Sections are reasonably organized but could be improved for clarity.
structure_review.formatting: Formatting is inconsistent and uses special characters.
structure_review.hierarchy: Hierarchy is not clearly defined; use bolding and headings.
structure_review.contact_details: Contact details are good, but could be formatted more professionally.

ats_recommendations: Use keywords from the job description.
Create a text-only version of the resume.
Keep the resume concise and focused on relevant skills and experience.
